name: Masked Magician, Harri
effect:
[AUTO](VC)[Generation Break 2]:When this unit attacks a vanguard, choose up to one card from your soul, call it to (RC), and that unit and this unit get [Power] +3000 until end of turn.
Magia-[AUTO](VC):When your G unit [Stride] during your turn, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose up to one card from your soul, call it to (RC), and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. At the end of that turn, put that called unit into the soul.

name: Card Dealer, Jacqueline
effect:
[AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon by a grade 3 with "Harri" in its card name, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at the top seven cards of your deck, choose up to two normal units without sentinel from among them, reveal them, choose one of the revealed cards, put it into hand, put the rest of the revealed cards into soul, and shuffle the deck.
[AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.

effect:
